akn:content.akn:p: (a) Exclusions from resources In determining the resources of an individual (and his eligible spouse, if any) there shall be excluded— In determining the resources of an individual (or eligible spouse) an insurance policy shall be taken into account only to the extent of its cash surrender value; except that if the total face value of all life insurance policies on any person is $1,500 or less, no part of the value of any such policy shall be taken into account.
